petitionerArgument.summaryOfViolation: Landlord failed to register property with Rent Stabilization Program and charged unlawful rent increases without proper compliance

rationale.respondentHadNotice: Failed to notify tenant of CSFRA protections at lease commencement
rationale.evidenceAssessment: Landlord failed to dispute tenant's factual statements and evidence showed multiple improper rent increases
rationale.impactAssessment: Tenant paid excessive rent due to landlord's non-compliance with CSFRA requirements

petitions.respondent: Frank Cervantes aka Francisco Cervantes for Cervantes, LLC
